LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.0.label: trust in blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.0.description: I trust them, and they trust me. Together we are invincibles.
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.1.label: liking blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.1.description: I'm glad to have a bond with such a nice person.
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.2.label: approving blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.3.label: worried about blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.3.description: I made a blood pact with someone I really like... but it's not mutual.
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.4.label: disaproving blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.4.description: They like me... I don't. At least they won't try to hurt me.
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.5.label: anxious about blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.5.description: I know they hate me... that can't be good.
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.6.label: hating blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.6.description: I hate this jerk ! Why do I have to put up with this ?
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.7.label: loathing blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactRelation.stages.7.description: If I die, they die. Might be worth it.
LanguageData.BloodPactDanger.stages.0.label: long distance blood pact
LanguageData.BloodPactDanger.stages.0.description: I can't help feeling upset. What if something happens ?
LanguageData.BloodPactDanger.stages.1.label: blood pact kidnaped
LanguageData.BloodPactDanger.stages.1.description: We need to do something about this ! Now !
